document.full_text: lebron james scored 35 points to lead miami to an overtime victory over the boston celtics on monday night and give the heat a 3-1 lead in the eastern conference semifinals.
document.title: heat 98, celtics 90 (ot): james, wade lead heat past celtics in ot
lines_and_colors: lebron james scored 35 points to lead miami to an overtime victory over the boston celtics on monday night and give the heat a 3-1 lead in the eastern conference semifinals.
